koohiiStory1: When yielding, soldiers raise the white flag before exiting from the trenches.
koohiiStory2: If you live in Japan, you are only too familiar with the helpful little man who assists you in getting out of every parking lot or parking garage, standing at the exit, waving his flag to make traffic yield to you.
words: narrow, tight, stiff, rigid, uneasy, formal, constrained
